LUKE 9.15 jah gatawidedun swa jah gatawidedun anakumbjan allans.
LUKE 9.16 nimands þan þans fimf hlaibans jah twans fiskans, insaiƕands du himina gaþiuþida ins jah gabrak jah gaf siponjam du faurlagjan þizai managein.
LUKE 9.17 jah matidedun jah sadai waurþun allai;
jah ushafan warþ, þatei aflifnoda im gabruko, tainjons twalif.
LUKE 9.18 jah warþ, miþþanei was is bidjands sundro, gamotidedun imma siponjos is, jah frah ins qiþands:
ƕana mik qiþand wisan þos manageins?
Iohannen þana daupjand, anþarai þan Heleian, sumai þan þatei praufetus sums þize airizane usstoþ.
aþþan jus ƕana mik qiþiþ wisan?

LUKE 9.21 iþ is þan gaƕotjands im faurbauþ ei mann ni qiþeina þata; LUKE 9.22 qiþands þatei skal sunus mans manag winnan jah uskusans fram sinistam wairþan jah gudjam jah bokarjam jah usqiman jah þridjin daga urreisan.
jabai ƕas wili afar mis gaggan, afaikai sik silban jah nimai galgan seinana dag ƕanoh jah laistjai mik.
LUKE 9.24 saei allis wili saiwala seina nasjan, fraqisteiþ izai;
aþþan saei fraqisteiþ saiwalai seinai in meina, ganasjiþ þo.
LUKE 9.25 ƕo allis þaurfte gataujiþ sis manna, gageigands þo manased alla, iþ sis silbin fraqistjands aiþþau gasleiþjands?
LUKE 9.26 saei allis skamaiþ sik meina aiþþau meinaize waurde, þizuh sunus mans skamaid sik, biþe qimiþ in wulþu seinamma jah attins jah þize weihane aggele.
sind sumai þize her standandane, þaiei ni kausjand dauþau, unte gasaiƕand þiudinassau gudis.
LUKE 9.28 waurþun þan afar þo waurda swe dagos ahtau, ganimands Paitru jah Iakobu jah Iohannen usiddja in fairguni bidjan.
LUKE 9.29 jah warþ, miþþanei baþ is, siuns andwairþjis is anþara jah gawaseins is ƕeita skeinandei.
LUKE 9.30 jah sai, wairos twai miþrodidedun imma, þaiei wesun Moses jah Helias;
LUKE 9.31 þai gasaiƕanans in wulþau qeþun urruns is, þoei skulda usfulljan in Iairusalem.
LUKE 9.32 iþ Paitrus jah þai miþ imma wesun kauridai slepa:
gawaknandans þan gaseƕun wulþu is jah þans twans wairans þans miþstandandans imma.

LUKE 9.33 jah warþ, miþþanei afskaiskaidun sik af imma, qaþ Paitrus du Iesua: talzjand, god ist unsis her wisan, jah gawaurkjaima hleiþros þrins, aina þus jah aina Mose jah aina Helijin, ni witands ƕa qiþiþ.
LUKE 9.34 þata þan imma qiþandin warþ milhma jah ufarskadwida ins;
faurhtidedun þan in þammei jainai qemun in þamma milhmin.
LUKE 9.35 jah stibna warþ us þamma milhmin qiþandei:
sa ist sunus meins sa liuba,
LUKE 9.36 jah miþþanei warþ so stibna, bigitans warþ Iesus ains.
jah eis þahaidedun jah mann ni gataihun in jainaim dagam ni waiht þizei gaseƕun.
LUKE 9.37 warþ þan in þamma afardaga, dalaþ atgaggandam im af fairgunja, gamotida imma manageins filu.
LUKE 9.38 jah sai, manna us þizai managein ufwopida qiþands:
laisari, bidja þuk insaiƕan du sunu meinamma, unte ainaha mis ist.
LUKE 9.39 jah sai, ahma nimiþ ina unhrains jah anaks hropeiþ jah tahjiþ ina miþ ƕaþon jah halisaiw aflinniþ af imma gabrikands ina.
LUKE 9.40 jah baþ siponjans þeinans ei usdribeina imma, jah ni mahtedun.
o kuni ungalaubjando jah inwindo, und ƕa siau at izwis jah þulau izwis?
LUKE 9.42 þaruh nauhþan duatgaggandin imma, gabrak ina sa unhulþa jah tahida.
gaƕotida þan Iesus ahmin þamma unhrainjin jah gahailida þana magu jah atgaf ina attin is.
LUKE 9.43 usfilmans þan waurþun allai ana þizai mikilein gudis.
at allaim þan sildaleikjandam bi alla þoei gatawida Iesus . qaþ þan du siponjam seinaim:
LUKE 9.44 lagjiþ jus in ausona izwara þo waurda, unte sunus mans skulds ist atgiban in handuns manne.
